snippet: Two Russian pranksters took credit, and a spokesman for the Russian president said they owed the singer an apology.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin's reported call to singer Elton John to discuss gay rights is revealed to be hoax; pranksters Vladimir Krasnov and Alexey Stolyarov admit to staging trick.

byline.original: By SOPHIA KISHKOVSKY and CHRISTOPHER D. SHEA

lead_paragraph: Two Russian pranksters took credit, and a spokesman for the Russian president said they owed the singer an apology.

headline.main: Chat Between Elton John and Vladimir Putin Was a Hoax
headline.print_headline: Chat With Putin Was a Hoax
